title: Elbows, Insults, and Punches: Wout Poels Recounts Catalunya Argy-Bargy with Movistar
content:
Dutch climber files official complaint against Iván García Cortina and accused Nairo Quintana of throwing elbows in key climbing stages.

Read the full article at Elbows, Insults, and Punches: Wout Poels Recounts Catalunya Argy-Bargy with Movistar on Velo.
author: ahood
